No. 2414/05  - tuesday,  december  10,  2024
EXTRAORDINARY
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
(Published by Authority)
PART IV (B) — LOcAL  GOVERNmENT
Local Government Notification
1a- PG 6936  - 07 (12/2024) 
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk
                  
       
              
               
            
        
                  
     
         
             
         
               
            
               
               
            
               
        
                 
        
              
               
            
         
                  
AYAGAmA  PRADEShIYA  SABhA
as per the function assigned to the Local councils in sabaragamuwa Province from “the order of   the preparation of plans of 
roads and narrow lanes maintained by Pradeshiya sabha in sabaragamuwa Province and publication of notices showing the 
list of names” in extraordinary Gazette No. 2316/20 and dated 24th January 2023 published by the Governor of sabaragamuwa 
Province which should be read with section 24 of Pradeshiya sabha act. No.15 of 1987 , it is hereby  notice to the public  
that the roads and narrow lanes included in the schedule below should be declared as the roads and narrow lanes owned by 
the ayagama Pradeshiya sabha at its meeting under the decision No.03 and dated 20.06.2024 . 
and it is further notice that if it is the opinion of the party who is entitled to the said land, that any road or narrow 
lane included in the said Schedule go through, a case should be filed in the Court before the expiry of a period of three months 
from the date of this notice to prove the entitlement.
and it is further noticed that every road and narrow  lane included in the said schedule that cases  are not assigned 
before the expiry of the said period of three months, are considered as a road or Narrow  lane that owned by ayagama 
Pradeshiya sabha.
 K. A. T. M. Kuda Arachchi,
 Secretary and Authorized Officer, 
 ayagama Pradeshiya sabha.
ayagama Pradeshiya sabha,
ayagama,                                         
05th of december, 2024.

<!-- page 2 -->
